pages.text: Having $(9)Overheal$() means that part of your physical damage dealt will be gained as an absorption shield. As opposed to lifesteal, Overheal works when you are at full health.$(p)This stat is only found on heavy weapons.

$(9)$(n)Base Value:$() 1$(p)$(9)$(n)Max Value:$() 1024$(p)Note: A value of 1.0 is actually 0% current hp damage, but if the base was zero, percentage modifiers would have no effect, and flat modifiers don't convey the bonus correctly.
